import{useThree}from'@react-three/fiber';import{useEffect}from'react';const CameraSetup=()=>{const{camera}=useThree();useEffect(()=>{camera.fov=60;camera.near=0.1;camera.far=1000;camera.position.set(0,15,30);// Move camera back and up for a better view
camera.lookAt(0,0,0);camera.updateProjectionMatrix();},[camera]);return null;};export default CameraSetup;
